directions: Combine turkey, beans, corn, tomatoes, bell peppers and onion in a bowl. Whisk all dressing ingredients in another bowl. Season with salt and pepper. Add dressing to turkey mixture and toss to combine. Divide arugula among 4 plates and top with turkey salad.
ingredients: 3 cups (about 3/4 pound) diced, cooked smoked turkey breast
1 can (15.5 ounces) black beans, rinsed and drained
1/2 cup chopped fresh mint (plus leaves for garnish)
title: Smoked Turkey, Black Bean, Bell Pepper and Corn Salad
